channel.title: Jagex up my ass...?
channel.description:
Well I don't know if I'm allowed to post it here but if I'm not I'm sorry... Fagex got access into my website and shut it down, it's an SMFforfree website and it's in maintenance mode and they changed my password... What the fuck do I do? My rsps is still online, do they want me to turn it off? In my email I keep getting emails saying: "Your e-mail has been received - Thank You." from "parents@jagex.com" and what the email says is:
Hi There, Thank you for e-mailing the Parents mailbox. This is an automated response confirming we have received your message. We're doing everything we can to ensure you receive a personal response from one of the team as soon as possible. Please be aware that this email address is in place as a point of contact for parents with serious concerns about player safety. As we deal with emails by priority, other queries may take longer to receive a response. As we receive a high volume of emails, if we deem your email to be spam (such as requesting free gold/items), we may not be able to respond. If you haven’t already, please ensure you let us know your account name (not your display name). This will mean that we can answer your query quicker. In the meantime, you may find one of the following links useful: Do you have a subscription question? Email us at billingsupport@jagex.com. o Français: facturation@jagex.com. o Português: cobranca@jagex.com. o Deutsch: zahlungsabwicklung@jagex.com. Are you suffering from a technical issue? Visit our Jagex Technical Support site. Have you spotted a bug or error in one of our game or on the website? Help us out with a bug report: Do you need to change your password? Please use our Account Recovery Form. Have you received a ban or mute that you feel was applied incorrectly? Please submit an Offence Appeal. Have you got a suggestion or simply want to discuss our games? Check out the forums: o RuneScape Forums o FunOrb Forums o War of Legends Forums o Find out more about our new game on the Stellar Dawn Forums Thank you once again for your e-mail. Kind Regards, parents@jagex.com www.Jagex.com – www.RuneScape.com – www.FunOrb.com “Great News! We have launched email account recovery, it’s a quicker and easier way to recover your password, helping keep your account safe and secure. To register your email address and take advantage of this new service simply click here. To say thank you, players who register and validate their email address will benefit from 10 extra bank spaces in Runescape!” -- IMPORTANT NOTICE The sender does not guarantee that this message, including any attachment, is secure or virus free. Also, it is confidential and may be privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure. If you are not the intended recipient, do not disclose or copy it or its contents. Please telephone or email the sender and delete the message entirely from your system. Jagex Limited is a company registered in England & Wales with company number 03982706 and a registered office at St John's Innovation Centre, Cowley Road, Cambridge, CB4 0WS, UK.
I got three of those in the past 2 days... The website shows this:
[img]http://www.jagex.com/img/jgs/domainblocked/logo.png[/img] This website domain is now controlled by Jagex Ltd. Jagex will take steps to defend its intellectual property and other legal rights. The activities previously offered by this website were against the law. If you wish to report other suspect content to Jagex Ltd, please visit www.jagex.com Copyright © 1999-2011 Jagex Ltd. Jagex, RuneScape and FunOrb are registered trademarks of Jagex Ltd. in the United Kingdom and a trademark used in other countries. To use our service you must agree to our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.

get a real forum, get a real webhost, and next time don’t bitch that jagex stole ur smfforfree site, the only thing that could happen is that you’d get your site shut down fagex doesn’t edit smfforfree sites and take their domains.

item.title: Jagex up my ass...?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:36, topic:381348”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=477165.msg3491414#msg3491414 date=1296958588]
Well my website is down, either from Jagex or from a long ex-friend faggot named steven who got hold of one of my passwords when I left him on my teamviewer all night… also downloaded a trojan and watched some porn
[/quote]
Let me get this straight. One of your ex friends has your password, you know you might have a virus, and when your website goes down you jump to “JAGEX DEY HAX ME”.

Are you kidding me?[/quote]

He downloaded the trojan last March, and I last saw the asshole in November, I’m not sure if he still knows my password…

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex up my ass...?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Javafire, post:33, topic:381348”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=477165.msg3491406#msg3491406 date=1296958159]

Someone who wants attention.

I don’t want attention, I want to know if I’m going to get sued, if I have to shut down my rsps too, can I make a new forum, what do I do?

I think this was just his attempt to advertise his server, seeing that the download link to “Download Fridderscape!” is still up.

I’m not bro, I swear to god, I’ll remove that link from mediafire, I was seriously shut down by Jagex and my smf pass is really changed, this isn’t fake.

Why would you think this is fake anyway? What kind of a jackass would shut down his own website?

The jackass trying to advertise his website.

Why would I advertise my website when it doesn’t even work???
[/quote]
you my friend, are a piece of work, get it right next time.[/quote]

Well my website is down, either from Jagex or from a long ex-friend faggot named steven who got hold of one of my passwords when I left him on my teamviewer all night… also downloaded a trojan and watched some porn

[quote=“Cole1497, post:34, topic:381348”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=477165.msg3491312#msg3491312 date=1296952451]
I’m not bro, I swear to god, I’ll remove that link from mediafire, I was seriously shut down by Jagex and my smf pass is really changed, this isn’t fake.
[/quote]
How are you going to remove it if Jagex took it over and changed your password? And why doesn’t it look like every other website they’ve taken down?[/quote]
I said I’ll remove it from Mediafire, like, go to mediafire.com and remove the link

Read full topic
